Description: Fragment of disc foot of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix with rounded edge; glazed black on exterior and underside; reserved outer face of foot and resting surface; inscription cut on underside; bore hole for analysis.
Curator's comments: Clay analysed by M. Hughes and found to be Attic: G. Harbottle, M.J. Hughes and S. Seleem, 'The origin of black-figure Greek ceramics found in Naucratis (Nile Delta)', Archaeometry 47 (2005), 511-518; p. 513, table 1, no.25
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1462)
